content: sl m work in patt for top of foot all sl sts are sl pw wyib sl m k2 ssk k to bor 2 sts decr row 1 sl1 p to end of row round 2 k to m sl m work in patt for top of foot sl m k to end of round row 2 sl k1 to end of row repeat rnds 1 and 2 11 13 14 times 64 work row 1 and 2 15 17 19 times more 72 80 sts ending with row 2 you should have 16 18 20 slipped stitches on each side of continue in patt for top of foot and k all sts the heel flap for the sole as established turn heel work until your foot is 5 cm shorter than desired length heel turn is worked back and forth over half the sts just like the heel flap 32 36 40 row 1 ws sl1 p21 24 26 p2tog p1 toe st s - stitch es round 1 decr round k to 4 sts before st st - stockinette stitch marker k2tog k2 sm k2 ssk twice k to ws - wrong side end 4 sts decrease round 2 k all sts repeat these 2 rounds until you have 24 sts 12 on the top of the foot and 12 on the sole knit all the sole stitches past the bor marker to be ready for sewing graft the sts together using kitchener stitch repeat for second sock happy knitting abbreviations bef - before bor - beginning of round circ - circumference co - cast on decr - decrease k - knit k2tog - knit two together m - marker p - purl p2tog - purl two together patt - pattern pm - place marker pw - purlwise round s - round s rs - right side sl - slip ssk - slip slip knit finished measurements in cm s m l ribbing 3 3 3 leg 11 11 5 12 foot length 22 25 27 circumference 18 20 22 2025 ©rebecka lindberg this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way
